mapper.select: select * from c_term WHERE sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} and status=1
select c_gateway_id as id ,name,coordinate,location,staus from c_gateway_attr1 WHERE sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} and c_gateway_attr1.staus=1
select count(*) from c_client_attr1 cca ,c_client_term cct,c_term ct where cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and ct.id=#{termid} and cct.c_client_id=cca.c_client_id and cca.staus=1

select cct.c_client_id as id , cca.name as name, ct.name as termname, cct.c_term_id as termid , cca.coordinate as coordinate,cca.coordinate_google from c_client_attr1 cca ,c_client_term cct,c_term ct where cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and ct.id=#{termid} and cct.c_client_id=cca.c_client_id and cca.staus=1 GROUP BY cct.c_client_id ORDER BY cct.c_client_id ASC

select cga.c_gateway_id as client_attri_id,cg.id as id ,cga.name as name ,cga.coordinate as coordinate, cga.location as location ,cga.lamp_pole_num as lamppolenum ,cgt.NAME_CH as typename ,-999 as termid ,bs.`name` as status ,"网关/断路器组" as termname ,-999 as termid, cgt.NAME_CH as aliastypename,cga.coordinate_google from c_gateway cg ,c_gateway_attr1 cga ,c_gateway_type cgt ,b_status bs where cg.id=cga.c_gateway_id and cga.c_gateway_type_id=cgt.id and bs.b_status_main_id=3 and bs.`value`=cga.staus and cga.staus=1 ORDER BY cg.id ASC
select cca.`name` from c_client_gateway ccg ,c_client_attr1 cca where cca.c_client_id=ccg.c_client_id and ccg.c_gateway_id=#{id} and cca.staus=1

select count(*) from c_gateway cg ,c_gateway_attr1 cga ,c_gateway_type cgt ,b_status bs where cg.id=cga.c_gateway_id and cga.c_gateway_type_id=cgt.id and bs.b_status_main_id=3 and bs.`value`=cga.staus and cga.staus=1

SELECT ct.id,cg.c_client_id,cr.name,ca.name as gatewayname FROM c_gateway ct INNER JOIN c_client_gateway cg ON ct.id = cg.c_gateway_id INNER JOIN c_client_attr1 cr ON cr.c_client_id = cg.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_gateway_attr1 ca ON ca.c_gateway_id = ct.id where ct.id=#{id} and cr.staus=1 and ca.staus=1

select cca.id as client_attri_id ,cc.id,cca.name,cca.lamp_pole_num as lamppolenum , cca.location, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate end coordinate , CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate_google end coordinate_google, cca.coordinate_google as coordinate_google_source, cca.coordinate as coordinate_baidu_source, ct.name as termname, ccus.brightness , ccty.name as typename , ct.id as termid , ccty.id as typeid , bs.`name` as status, "灯" as aliastypename, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as partMaplinetCnt, cgy.c_gateway_id as gatewayid FROM c_client cc INNER join c_client_attr1 cca ON cc.id = cca.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_client_term cct ON cc.id = cct.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_term ct ON cct.c_term_id = ct.id INNER JOIN c_client_upload_status ccus ON ccus.c_client_id = cca.id INNER JOIN b_status bs ON cca.staus=bs.`value` and bs.b_status_main_id=3 INNER JOIN c_client_type ccty ON ccty.id=cca.c_client_type_id LEFT JOIN c_client_gateway cgy ON cgy.c_client_id = cca.c_client_id LEFT JOIN (select cdl.c_client_id,external_coordinate from c_partmap cpp inner join c_partmap_detail cdl where cdl.id=cpp.id and cdl.c_termid=#{termid} GROUP BY cdl.c_client_id) partMap ON partMap.c_client_id= cca.c_client_id WHERE ct.id=#{termid} and cca.staus=1
and ( cca.c_client_id=#{client_attri_id})
ORDER BY ct.id,cct.c_client_id ASC

select cca.id as client_attri_id,cc.id,cca.name,cca.lamp_pole_num as lamppolenum , cca.location, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate end coordinate , CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate_google end coordinate_google, cca.coordinate_google as coordinate_google_source, cca.coordinate as coordinate_baidu_source, ccus.brightness , ccty.name as typename , ccty.id as typeid , bs.`name` as status, "灯" as aliastypename, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as partMaplinetCnt FROM c_client cc INNER join c_client_attr1 cca ON cc.id = cca.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_client_gateway ct ON ct.c_client_id = cca.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_client_upload_status ccus ON ccus.c_client_id = cca.id INNER JOIN b_status bs ON cca.staus=bs.`value` and bs.b_status_main_id=3 INNER JOIN c_client_type ccty ON ccty.id=cca.c_client_type_id LEFT JOIN (select cdl.c_client_id,external_coordinate from c_partmap cpp inner join c_partmap_detail cdl where cdl.id=cpp.id and cdl.c_gateway_id=#{gatewayid} GROUP BY cdl.c_client_id) partMap ON partMap.c_client_id= cca.c_client_id WHERE ct.c_gateway_id=#{gatewayid} and cca.staus=1 ORDER BY cc.id ASC

select ccty.id as typeid ,ccty.name as typename from c_client_term cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where cct.c_term_id=#{groupname} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.staus=1 GROUP BY ccty.id

select ccty.id as typeid ,ccty.name as typename from c_client_attr1 cca INNER JOIN c_client_gateway ccg ON cca.c_client_id=cca.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_client_type ccty ON cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id where ccg.c_gateway_id=#{groupnameid} and cca.staus=1 GROUP BY ccty.id

select cca.location, ccty.name as typename ,ccty.id as typeid from c_client_term cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where ccty.id=#{typeid} AND cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.staus=1 GROUP BY cca.location

select cca.location, ccty.name as typename ,ccty.id as typeid from c_client_gateway cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where ccty.id=#{typeid} AND cct.c_gateway_id=#{termid} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.staus=1 GROUP BY cca.location

select cca.name, cca.location,ccty.name as typename ,ccty.id as typeid from c_client_term cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where cca.location= #{location} and ccty.id=#{typeid} AND cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.staus=1 GROUP BY cca.name

select cca.name, cca.location,ccty.name as typename ,ccty.id as typeid from c_client_gateway cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where cca.location= #{location} and ccty.id=#{typeid} AND cct.c_gateway_id=#{termid} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.staus=1 GROUP BY cca.name

select cca.c_client_id as id,cca.name, cca.location,ccty.name as typename ,ccty.id as typeid from c_client_term cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where cca.name= #{name} and cca.location= #{location} and ccty.id=#{typeid} AND cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.staus=1 GROUP BY cca.c_client_id

select cca.c_client_id as id,cca.name, cca.location,ccty.name as typename ,ccty.id as typeid from c_client_gateway cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where cca.name= #{name} and cca.location= #{location} and ccty.id=#{typeid} AND cct.c_gateway_id=#{termid} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.staus=1 GROUP BY cca.c_client_id

select cca.id as client_attri_id,cc.id,cca.name,cca.lamp_pole_num as lamppolenum , cca.location, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate end coordinate , CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate_google end coordinate_google , ct.name as termname,ccus.brightness , ccty.name as typename ,bs.name as status , ct.id as termid ,"灯" as aliastypename , cca.coordinate_google as coordinate_google_source, cca.coordinate as coordinate_baidu_source, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as partMaplinetCnt, partMap.id as partMap_Id, (select map_pictrue_path from c_partmap where id=#{partMap_Id}) as map_pictrue_path from c_client cc INNER join c_client_attr1 cca ON cc.id = cca.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client_term cct ON cc.id = cct.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client_gateway ccg ON ccg.c_client_id = cct.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_term ct ON cct.c_term_id = ct.id INNER JOIN c_client_upload_status ccus ON ccus.c_client_id = cca.id INNER JOIN b_status bs ON cca.staus=bs.`value` and bs.b_status_main_id=3 INNER JOIN c_client_type ccty ON ccty.id=cca.c_client_type_id LEFT JOIN (select cdl.c_client_id,external_coordinate,cpp.id,cpp.map_pictrue_path from c_partmap cpp inner join c_partmap_detail cdl where cdl.id=cpp.id and (cdl.c_termid=#{termid} or c_gateway_id=#{gatewayid}) ) partMap ON partMap.c_client_id= cca.c_client_id
where 1=1 and cca.staus=1
and ( ccty.id=#{typeid})
and ( ct.id=#{termid})
and ( ccg.c_gateway_id=#{gatewayid})
and ( cca.location=#{location})
and ( cca.name=#{name})
and ( cc.id=#{id})
and ( cca.id=#{client_attri_id})
and Not exists(select cdl.c_client_id,external_coordinate,cpp.id from c_partmap cpp inner join c_partmap_detail cdl where cdl.id=cpp.id and (cdl.c_termid=#{termid} or cdl.c_gateway_id=#{gatewayid}) and cdl.id!=#{partMap_Id} and cdl.c_client_id=cca.c_client_id)
ORDER BY cct.c_client_id ASC

select cct.c_gateway_id as gatewayid, cca.id as client_attri_id,cc.id,cca.name,cca.lamp_pole_num as lamppolenum , cca.location, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate end coordinate , CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate_google end coordinate_google , cca.coordinate_google as coordinate_google_source, cca.coordinate as coordinate_baidu_source, ct.gateway_code as termname,ccus.brightness , ccty.name as typename ,bs.name as status , ct.id as termid ,"灯" as aliastypename , CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as partMaplinetCnt, partMap.id as partMap_Id, (select map_pictrue_path from c_partmap where id=#{partMap_Id}) as map_pictrue_path from c_client cc INNER join c_client_attr1 cca ON cc.id = cca.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_client_gateway cct ON cca.c_client_id = cct.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_gateway ct ON cct.c_gateway_id = ct.id INNER JOIN c_client_upload_status ccus ON ccus.c_client_id = cca.id INNER JOIN b_status bs ON cca.staus=bs.`value` and bs.b_status_main_id=3 INNER JOIN c_client_type ccty ON ccty.id=cca.c_client_type_id LEFT JOIN (select cdl.c_client_id,external_coordinate,cpp.id,cpp.map_pictrue_path from c_partmap cpp inner join c_partmap_detail cdl where cdl.id=cpp.id and cdl.c_gateway_id=#{gatewayid} ) partMap ON partMap.c_client_id= cca.c_client_id where 1=1 and cca.staus=1
and ( ccty.id=#{typeid})
and ( ct.id=#{gatewayid})
and ( cca.location=#{location})
and ( cca.name=#{name})
and ( cc.id=#{id})
and ( cca.id=#{client_attri_id})
and Not exists(select cdl.c_client_id,external_coordinate,cpp.id from c_partmap cpp inner join c_partmap_detail cdl where cdl.id=cpp.id and cdl.c_termid=#{termid} and cdl.id!=#{partMap_Id} and cdl.c_client_id=cca.c_client_id)
ORDER BY cct.c_client_id ASC
mapper.update: update c_client_upload_status cca set cca.brightness=100 where cca.id= #{client_attri_id}
update c_client_upload_status cca set cca.brightness=0 where cca.id= #{client_attri_id}
update c_client_upload_status ccus set ccus.brightness = #{brightness} where ccus.id = #{client_attri_id}

update c_gateway_attr1 cga set cga.coordinate_google=#{coordinate} where cga.c_gateway_id=#{client_attri_id}
update c_breaker_attr1 cba set cba.coordinate_google=#{coordinate} where cba.id=#{client_attri_id}

insert into c_partmap ( partmap_name , external_coordinate, map_pictrue_path, partmap_gateway_id, partmap_termid
) values ( #{partmap_name}, #{external_coordinate}, #{map_pictrue_path}, #{c_gatewayid}, #{c_termid} )

insert into c_partmap_detail ( id, inner_coordinate, c_client_id, c_gateway_id, c_termid ) values ( #{id}, #{inner_coordinate}, #{c_client_id}, (select cct.c_gateway_id from c_client_gateway cct where cct.c_client_id=#{c_client_id} limit 1), (select cct.c_term_id from c_client_term cct where cct.c_client_id=#{c_client_id} limit 1) )
mapper.update:
delete from c_partmap_detail where id=#{id}
and (c_client_id=#{c_client_id})
mapper.select:
select distinct a.id,partmap_name ,a.external_coordinate ,a.map_pictrue_path,a.c_client_type_id ,b.c_termid,b.inner_coordinate, b.c_client_id,a.map_pictrue_path from c_partmap A LEFT JOIN c_partmap_detail B on a.id=b.id
where 1=1
and (a.partmap_name=#{partmap_name})
and (a.map_pictrue_path=#{map_pictrue_path})
and (a.external_coordinate=#{external_coordinate})
and (a.id=#{id})
and ((b.c_termid=#{c_termid}) OR ( Not Exists( select 1 from c_partmap_detail where c_termid=#{c_termid}) AND Exists( select 1 from c_partmap where partmap_termid=a.partmap_termid and partmap_termid=#{c_termid})))
and ((b.c_gateway_id=#{c_gatewayid}) OR ( Not Exists( select 1 from c_partmap_detail where c_gateway_id=#{c_gatewayid}) AND Exists( select 1 from c_partmap where partmap_gateway_id=a.partmap_gateway_id and partmap_gateway_id=#{c_gatewayid})))
ORDER BY a.id,external_coordinate

select A.ID,A.partmap_name ,A.external_coordinate ,count(B.c_client_id) as clinetCnt ,A.map_pictrue_path,B.c_termid,B.c_gateway_id from c_partmap A LEFT JOIN c_partmap_detail B on A.ID=B.ID where 1=1 Group BY A.partmap_name ,A.external_coordinate,A.map_pictrue_path,B.c_termid,B.c_gateway_id
SELECT a.id,b.name,a.c_client_id FROM c_partmap_detail a inner join c_client_attr1 b on a.c_client_id = b.c_client_id WHERE a.id != #{id} and b.c_client_id = #{c_client_id}
